summary: Two exorcists literally remove the skeletons from the cupboards from people's homes. Some fairly embarrassing secrets are revealed along the way. A case where the skeletons have hidden themselves turns the lives of all those involved.
cast: Ed Gaughan|Andrew Buckley|Tuppence Middleton|Paprika Steen|Jason Isaacs|Josef Whitfield|Paul Dallison|Keith Lancaster|Kirsty Williams|Jasper Williams|Tanya Myers|Colin Wells|Will Adamsdale|Laura Freeman|Gillian Goodman|Mark Devenport|Rebecca Jackson|Charlie Binns|Holly Mai Leighton|Njaal Bendixen|Colin Batchford|Charlotte Whitfield|Wilf Dallison
keywords: psychic power|missing father|missing husband|paranormal phenomena|supernatural power
title: Skeletons
